column4: Anyone know a good program that can setup an ISO to a USB Thumb/Pen Drive? Every version i've found so far wants me to go w/ a CD instead of the Thumbdrive i have.
for windows?
For VMware
have no idea about vmware
I have the ISO, just need a program that will burn it to my Thumbdrive.
why do you need a usb (or CD for that mater) for vmware.. just boot directly from the ISO.
how do you boot directly from the ISO?
it's an option under the settings.
i know its there, but i don't use vmware so not 100% sure
but its there.
i have not installed it yet. it is going on a clean hard drive..
i thought you said you were using vmware
i will be, i've downloaded the ISO, but cannot get it to start up on my thumb drive.
why are you tryig to start it on a USB< if you want to install it in vmware?.. all you have to do is boot the ISO in vmware.. thats my point.
So i should just run the ISO in Ubuntu and install it into the clean Hard drive?
you're making no sense... i can't make heads or tails of what you're wanting to do.
vmware, installs to a virtual drive, not a hard drive.
So VMware does not run first, you boot from the OS, then into VMWare?
sorry.... i have no idea what you're asking, you're gonna have to ask questions that make sense, in order to get help
k then..
Anyone know of a program that will burn an ISO to a Thumbdrive instead of a CD/DVD
unetbootin
